metadata.name: Barcelona
metadata.description: Barcelona is a city that embraces beauty, and its obsession with arts, culture and creativity is nothing short of infectious. From vibrant neighborhoods filled with independent art galleries to cutting-edge cabaret performances, this is one city where bringing a sketchbook is simply expected. Our top picks for the best cities for arts and culture include Barcelona's top art museums, historic Gothic Quarter and modernist Park Güell and La Sagrada Família. And what better way to experience the creative energy than by exploring free art exhibits?
